title: Experiential Learning and Mentoring Program for Strengthening Practical Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational business administration concepts and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Learners are ordinary citizens with practical industry experience across sectors, aiming to bridge the gap between management theory and practice

learning_goals: Learners can secure data-driven decision-making capabilities by analyzing real-world business cases.
Learners establish and execute project-based problem-solving strategies through collaboration with peers and mentors.
Learners perform self-directed learning management and performance evaluation in online learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
